title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4830.7 - Persons seeking immunity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4830.7 - Persons seeking immunity

State Regulations

Any person seeking immunity who is called to appear
before the commission to answer questions or produce evidence at a hearing, inquiry or investigation, shall make written application therefor to the
chairman not less than three days prior to such person"TMs scheduled appearance
before the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4830.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
